mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, job_fair_id, company_id, campus_id, site_id, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.id job_fair_id, cj.quarter, cj.job_fair_title, cj.start_time, cj.end_time, cj.status job_fair_status, cjfc.id, cjfc.company_id, ct2.id campus_id, ct2.type_name campus_Name, cs.id site_id, cs.site_name, cs.site_desc, cs.status site_status FROM crim_type ct INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON ct.id = cj.year_level_id INNER JOIN crim_job_fair_company cjfc ON cj.id = cjfc.job_fair_id AND cjfc.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN crim_type ct2 ON cjfc.campus_id = ct2.id LEFT JOIN crim_site cs ON cjfc.site_id = cs.id WHERE ct.pid = 5 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
